name: grpc_static_codegen
description: This is the static code generation variant of the Hello World. Code in these examples is pre-generated using protoc and the Node gRPC protoc plugin, and the generated code can be found in various `*_pb.js` files. The command line sequence for generating those files is as follows (assuming that `protoc` and `grpc_node_plugin` are present, and starting in the directory which contains this README.md file):
